titleStmt.title: The rise, growth, and fall of Antichrist together with the reign of Christ. by Edw. Haughton minister.
titleStmt.author: Haughton, Edward, 17th cent.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R.W. for Francis Tyton, and are to be sold at his shop at the three Daggers in Fleetstreet, near the Inner-Temple Gate,

notesStmt.note: "The reign of Christ" (p. 149), has special t.p.
With an afterword stating "that the 21 & 22 Chapters of the Revelations, are a description of a State of a Church here below,..".
Reproduction of the original in the Thomason Collection, British Library.

place.placeName: his shop at the three Daggers in Fleetstreet, near the Inner-Temple Gate
